name: Red Light Green Light (FreakyDAYZ)
description:
1 or 2 player fan base game made with GODOT  inspired by squid games

was trying to keep within the 8 bit/buggy style.

I hope you enjoy playing, its definitely more fun playing with 2 people

W to move player 1 and P to move player 2.

You can also use TouchScreen

PS..   can you RATE THIS GAME
